# placementSparsePageSize

**Instance Property**

Determines the page size for a placement sparse texture.

## Declaration

```swift
var placementSparsePageSize: MTLSparsePageSize { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to a non-zero value to create a *placement sparse texture*.

Placement sparse textures are instances of [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTexture] that you assign memory to using a [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLHeap] instance of type [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLHeapType/placement] and a [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLHeapDescriptor/maxCompatiblePlacementSparsePageSize] at least as large as the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLSparsePageSize] value you assign to this property.

This value is 0 by default.
